trackerInfo.tooltip: See infowmation about the connyected twackers. An option with yewwow text wequiwes a westawt of the connyection ow pwogwam 2 appwy.

trackerSettings.title: {trackerName} meowings
trackerSettings.text: Owewwide the gwobaw twacker meowings fow this twacker. Can be usefuw if onwy cewtain twackers hawe bad mag statuses.

fps.title: Nyas twansfew wate
fps.tooltip: Sewect the nyas twansfew wate fow the twackers. If using Bwuetooth, 50FPS may be mowe stabwe.

sensorMode.title: Sensow mode
sensorMode.tooltip: Sewect the sensow mode fow the twackers. Mode 1 enyabwes the magnyetometew which is best if u hawe a stabwe geomagnyetic enwiwonment (magnyatus is gween ow yewwow). If unstabwe (magnyatus is wed), use mode 2.

sensorCorrection.title: Sensow auto cowwection
sensorCorrection.tooltip: Enyabwe ow disabwe sensow auto cowwection (dynyamic cawibwation) featuwes. Usuawwy nyot nyeeded 2 be changed and wesuwts wawy between enwiwonments.

comPorts.title: COM powts
comPorts.tooltip: Sewect the COM powts youw GX(6/2) dongwes ow HawitowaX 1.1b/1.1/1.0 twackers awe using. Up 2 4 powts can be sewected (3 fow GX6 and 1 fow GX2) unwess checks awe bypassed.

sensorMode.title: Sensow mode
sensorMode.tooltip: Sewect the sensow mode fow the twackers. Mode 1 enyabwes the magnyetometew which is best if u hawe a stabwe geomagnyetic enwiwonment (magnyatus is gween ow yewwow). If unstabwe (magnyatus is wed), use mode 2.

sensorCorrection.title: Sensow auto cowwection

about.title: Who us :3
about.text: The SwimeTowa pwojyect is a middwewawe pwogwam that awwows u 2 connyect the HawitowaX twackers 2 the SwimeVR servew.

debugging.title: Demeowing
debugging.tooltip: An option with yewwow text wequiwes a westawt of the connyection ow pwogwam 2 appwy.
debugging.text: Enyabwe ow disabwe demeowing featuwes fow the pwogwam. Using wogging mode 'Awl nibbles (!!!)' wiww cause huge wog fiwes and wag, onwy use if asked ow hawe twacker issues!

onboarding.title: Wewcome 2 SwimeTowa! :3
onboarding.text:
SwimeTowa is a middwewawe pwogwam that awwows u 2 connyect youw HawitowaX twackers 2 the SwimeVR servew, bypassing the officiaw softwawe!

2 get stawted, sewect how u wouwd wike 2 set up the pwogwam. Aftew u set up the pwogwam, u wiww be Gwided on how 2 set up SwimeVR servew.

step-2.title: Gwided setup
step-2.text:
Gwided setup wiww hewp you thwough the pwocess of setting up the pwogwam step-by-step. You can wet the pwogwam twy to cat-detect youw settings ow answew the questions about youw setup.

It is wecommended (but nyot nyecessawy) to hawe at weast onye of youw twackers tuwnyed on and connyected to youw computew befowe continyuing. When you awe weady, cwick the "Nyext" button.

step-3.title: Cat-detection
step-3.text:
Pwess the button bewow 2 stawt the cat-detection pwocess. The pwocess may take up 2 20 seconds 2 compwete, make suwe the officiaw softwawe is cwosed.
Aftew the pwocess is compwete, u wiww weceiwe a pop-up with the wesuwts - make suwe they awe accuwate. If the pwocess faiws, u can twy again ow set up SwimeTowa manyuawwy.
step-3.text2: If u awe happy with the wesuwts, cwick the "Nyext" button 2 continyue. Othewwise, u may set up SwimeTowa manyuawwy.

step-4.title: SwimeVR setup
step-4.text: Nyow we'we suwe u knyow what SwimeVR is, wight? It's the weason why u downwoaded SwimeTowa in the fiwst pwace - it's a softwawe that awwows fow communyication between muwtipwe sensows/twackers 2 use in SteamVR, wike the officiaw softwawe.
step-4.text2: 2 use SwimeTowa, u nyeed 2 hawe SwimeVR servew instawwed on youw computew. If u don't hawe it instawwed yet, cwick the button abuv 2 downwoad and instaww it. Aftew, pwess the "Nyext" button 2 weawn how 2 set it up fow SwimeTowa.

step-5.title: SwimeVR connyection
step-5.text: At this point, u wiww nyow want 2 connyect youw VR headset 2 youw PC - it's time 2 put on youw twackers! Make suwe youw twackers (and VR headset) awe connyected and pwess the "Stawt connyection" button 2 connyect them 2 the SwimeVR servew.
step-5.text2: When u see awlyouw twackers connyected abuv, check SwimeVR servew and accept awl"A nyew twacker was found" pop-ups. Cwick the "Nyext" button 2 continyue 2 the nyext step.

step-6.title: Twacker assignment
step-6.text: With youw twackers connyected, u can go thwough the inyitiaw setup of SwimeVR servew. Cwick "Wet's get set up!", then "Skip Wi-Fi meowings", and then "I put stickews and stwaps!". Nyext, assign youw twackers 2 the cowwect body pawt - an exampwe is shown in the scweenshot bewow.

step-7.title: Meowting cawibwation
step-7.text: Aftew assignying the twackers, u wiww be bwought 2 the meowting cawibwation scween. Sewect "Automatic Meowting" (highwy wecommended) and fowwow the on-scween instwuctions on how 2 do a meowting cawibwation. If it does nyot workie wight aftew the cawibwation, u can awways wedo it untiw it's accuwate ow mess with "Manyuaw Meowting".

step-8.title: Wesets & cawibwation
step-8.text: You wiww nyow see a smaww tutowiaw on how to pewfowm "wesets" in SwimeVR. With SwimeTowa (awong with SwimeVR's tap-to-weset), you may physicawwy pwess any of the buttons on youw twackers a nyumbew of times (within 0.5s). See the wist fow the weset options:

step-9.title: When 2 weset
step-9.text: Hewe awe the expwanyations of the thwee diffewent wesets and when they wouwd be used:
step-9.text2: A yaw weset is the onye u wiww use the most, it ewiminyates most (if nyot aww) dwift on onye axis. This is wess accuwate but the fastest and most conwenyient. U onwy nyeed 2 stwaighten youw wimbs - this can ewen be used whiwe waying ow sitting down!
step-9.text3: A fuwl weset is the most accuwate and compwetewy wesets the skeweton in SwimeVR. U myust be standing up and stwaight whiwe doing this weset.
step-9.text4: A meowting weset is used when the position of youw twackers hawe physicawwy muved (ow meowting cawibwation is off). U myust be in a "ski pose" whiwe doing this weset.

step-10.title: Body pwopowtions
step-10.text: SwimeVR appwies youw body pwopowtions on a wiwtuaw skeweton fow accuwate twacking. Sewect "Automatic pwopowtions" and fowwow the on-scween instwuctions cawibwate by fowwowing a set of muvments. U onwy nyeed 2 do this once and is awso optionyaw! If u hawe issues, u can awways wetwy ow use the defauwts ("Weset awlpwopowtions").

step-11.title: Wewaunching SwimeVR
step-11.text: When wewaunching SwimeVR, pewfowm a "Fuwl Weset" and then a "Meowting Weset" befowe cawibwating in-game. Again, u do nyot hawe 2 pewfowm the pwopowtions cawibwation again - it is onwy donye once! Make suwe 2 wefew 2 the SwimeTowa wiki ow watch videwos on how 2 get the best fwom SwimeVR - ZWock35 is a gweat pewson 2 watch!

pairing.title: GX(6/2) twacker Paiwing
pairing.text:
Manyage the paiwing of youw twackers connyected wia the GX(6/2) communyication dongwes.

2 paiw, pwess "Paiw/Unpaiw" then howd down the (weft/smawwew) sub button on the twacker u want 2 paiw fow 3 seconds. Changing channyews wequiwes we-paiwing the twackers.

Tweat this as a bweta - if u hawe issues, use the officiaw softwawe.

connectionFailed.title: Connyection faiwed
connectionFailed.message: Faiwed 2 stawt a connyection wia the sewected connyection mode(s). Pwease make suwe the officiaw softwawe is cwosed and (if appwicabwe), Bwuetooth is on and/ow the cowwect COM powts awe sewected.

slimevrNotFound.title: SwimeVR nyot found
slimevrNotFound.message: SwimeVR servew does nyot seem 2 be wunning, make suwe it is wunning and westawt the connyection. If it is awweady wunning & youw twackers awe connyected, this is safe 2 ignyowe.

comPortsMissing.title: COM powts missing
comPortsMissing.message: Some COM powts set in the config wewe nyot found, pwease make suwe youw dongwe(s) and twackers awe connyected.

noLogsFolder.title: Nyo wogs!
noLogsFolder.message: U shouwd pwobabwy enyabwe debug wogging fiwst in demeowing meowings.

noConnectionMode.title: Nyo connyection mode enyabwed
noConnectionMode.message: Pwease enyabwe at weast onye connyection mode in the pwogwam's meowings.

noTrackerModel.title: Nyo twacker modew sewected
noTrackerModel.message: Pwease sewect a dewice modew in the pwogwam's meowings.

noComPorts.title: Nyo COM powts sewected
noComPorts.message: Pwease sewect at weast onye COM powt in the pwogwam's meowings.

trackerIMUError.title: Twacker IMU ewwow
trackerIMUError.message: Faiwed 2 pwocess IMU nibbles fwom a twacker aftew many twies :( Pwease westawt the connyection and check wog fiwes fow mowe infowmation.

trackerWriteError.title: Twacker wwite ewwow
trackerWriteError.message: Faiwed 2 wwite nibbles 2 the twacker, pwease check wog fiwes fow mowe infowmation.

trackerReadError.title: Twacker wead ewwow
trackerReadError.message: Faiwed 2 wead nibbles fwom the twacker, pwease check wog fiwes fow mowe infowmation.

unexpectedError.title: Unyexpected ewwow
unexpectedError.message: An unyexpected ewwow occuwwed, pwease check wog fiwes fow mowe infowmation.

unix.title: ARCH USER DETECTED!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
unix.message:
It seems u awe wunning SwimeTowa on a Unyix-wike system, some extwa setup is wequiwed befowe continyuing.

The SwimeTowa wiki wiww open aftew this diawog 2 guide u thwough the nyecessawy steps.

complete.title: Onboawding compwete!
complete.message:
SwimeTowa has been successfuwly set up! U can awways weopen the onboawding scween in the pwogwam meowings. Aftew this diawog, the pwogwam wiww open the wiki page fow u 2 wead mowe infowmation.

Enjyoy!

pre-check.title: Cat-detect pwe-check
pre-check.message:
This featuwe wiww attempt 2 automaticawwy detect youw twackers, connyection mode, and twacker meowings 2 appwy the meowings in the pwogwam fow u.

Make suwe the officiaw softwawe is cwosed befowe pwoceeding. It is awso wecommended 2 tuwn on at weast onye of youw twackers 2 find its meowings.

success.title: Cat-detect compweted!
success.message: Cat-detect compweted successfuwly. Wemembew this may nyot be accuwate, so pwease wewiew the meowings that hawe been appwied bewow: {settings}

failed.title: Cat-detect faiwed!
failed.message: Cat-detect faiwed. Pwease make suwe u hawe youw Bwuetooth/GX(6/2) dongwes pwugged in & tuwnyed on.

initial.title: Manyuaw setup
initial.message: Pwease answew the fowwowing questions to set up the pwogwam. If you awe unsuwe, you can awways use the cat-detect featuwe in the onboawding scween.

trackerModel.title: Twacker modew
trackerModel.message: Sewect the modew of HawitowaX twackers you hawe fwom the wist.

connectionMode.title: Connyection mode
connectionMode.message: Sewect the connyection mode used to connyect to the twackers. Muwtipwe modes can be meowed at the same time if wan :3

autoStart.title: Auto-stawt connyection
autoStart.message: Awwow the pwogwam to automaticawwy connyect to youw twackers wen openying the pwogwam??

autoOff.message: Awwow the pwogwam to automaticawwy kil youw twackers upon cwosing the pwogwam??

finish.title: Setup compwete
finish.message: The pwogwam has been successfuwwy set up with the settings u choosed, you can awways modifwy this latew. Weview what you hawe chosen bewow: {settings}

available.title: Update awaiwabwe
available.message: A nyew {versionType} wewsion ({latestVersion}) of SwimeTowa is awaiwabwe.
available.detail: Pwease wisit the GitHub weweases page 2 downwoad the watest wewsion.

maxLoggingWarning.title: Wogging mode wawnying :o
maxLoggingWarning.message: U hawe sewected a wogging mode that may cause huge wog fiwes and wag. Wemembew 2 onwy use this mode if asked ow hawe twacker issues!!

fixTrackers.title: Fix bwoken twackers meow
fixTrackers.message:
Fow as wong as this diawog box is open, this featuwe wiww attempt 2 fix youw hawd-bwicked GX(6/2) twackers if they awe boot-wooping (tuwnying off immediatewy aftew being powewed on). This wowks by wepeatedwy sending a "set settings" command 2 wemuv the powew-off fwag.

Attempt 2 keep tuwnying on youw twackers untiw they stay on, then cwose this diawog when they awe fixed. If youw twackers awe stiww nyot wowking, pwease wefew 2 the suppowt page.

Aftew pewfowming this, youw settings wiww weset 2 the fowwowing:
Sensow mode: 2
FPS: 50
Sensow auto cowwection: accew
